==== About Me ====

Personal: I live in Georigia, USA. I am employed by a medical software company as a staging specialist, while at the same time going back to school to become a networking specialist.

Ubuntu Related: I am trying to get into the Beginners' Team on UF. Also I am a team member of the Ubuntu Gamers Arena. I work with the Testing Team and Marketing Team. At this time I am still new to this, but plan to do a lot of work with Ubuntu in the near and distant future. More to come as it happens.
